title: Drawing, "Designs for Mechanical Furniture: Cabinet and Desk", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: At top, two commodes, with plan and elevation for each and, for the left one, section as well. Below, a desk fitted with a fall-foot, for writing, and cabinets above. Scale for each piece.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Mechanical Furniture: Cabinet and Desk", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-498.
